data.title: Holy Cross Church, Port Talbot, Neath Port Talbot
data.meta_description: Holy Cross Church is a Grade II listed building in Port Talbot, Neath Port Talbot, Wales. See why it was listed, view it on a map, see visitor comments and photos and share your own comments and photos of this building.
data.text:
Uploader's Comments

Edward Haycock Sr., architect of Shrewsbury (not to be confused with local Taibach notable Lord (Llewellyn) HEycock, was also employed as the site architect at Margam Castle 1830-35, where he designed many outbuildings eg East Lodge.
